nodes.text: White Panther was the retrofitted Podracer of the Aleena Podracer pilot Mab Kador. The repulsorcraft vehicle could be piloted with at least one individual onboard. In 22 BBY, Kador took part with the White Panther in a Podrace held at the Mos Espa Grand Arena on the planet Tatooine. The young Mandalorian bounty hunter Boba Fett, a fan of the sport, recognized both Kador and the White Panther before the race started. However, the winner of the race had been predetermined by the Hutt crime lord Jabba Desilijic Tiure.
The White Panther and its pilot first appeared in Boba Fett: Hunted. Published in 2003, the young reader novel was written by Elizabeth Hand.
